short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SpiderTab allows you to easily set up certain webpages and layouts as your default 'new tab page'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome allows you to have a custom page set up as the 'new tab page', but what happens if you want more than one page to be opened whenever you start a new tab? This is exactly what SpiderTab allows you to do. Easily set up certain webpages and layouts as your default 'new tab page'.
